body.query: FROM test | sort emp_no | eval x1 = concat(ip1, ip2), x2 = coalesce(x1, "255.255.255.255"), x3 = to_ip(x2) | keep emp_no, x*

Only first 20 failures recorded.", 299 Elasticsearch-8.18.3-28fc77664903e7de48ba5632e5d8bfeb5e3ed39c "Line 1:98: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: '127.00.1' is not an IP string literal."
